title: Étretat, mon amour (Étretat, My Love)
itunes:title: Étretat, mon amour (Étretat, My Love)
description:
When the best crab fisherman in Étretat, Normandy gradually loses his eyesight, he does everything in his power to continue fishing along the coastline he loves.

A transcript of this episode is available at https://bit.ly/3g0bdOx.
